entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:59 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.2°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning then changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow late this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
